title: WTB: T205 Minor Leaguers VGEX or Worse

posts.post_title: WTB: T205 Minor Leaguers VGEX or Worse
posts.post_content: Looking for any and all T205 Minor Leaguers in low grade but not completely trashed condition. Really don't want major paper loss. Need 'em all except for Nee. Thanks!
